EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-09-10 Partner Town Hall.Thanks for joining us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining our Partner Town Hall Webcast!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining our Partner Town Hall Webcast. You can watch it again on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-quarterly-partner-town-hall/]]>. Are you attending Microsoft Ignite? If yes, we’d love to offer you an exclusive invitation for a 30-minute meeting with members of our executive team. If you’re interested, email meetings@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:meetings@turbonomic.com]]> with your preferred date and time.
Thank you as always for your partnership! -Team Turbonomic
